After D sends to B: Bridge B1 Bridge B2 Destination | Port number Destination | Port number B 1 B 2 D 2 D 2 Now, if F' sends a packet to D then It will first send to B2, and since B2 knows that D is on port 2 hence it will not forward the packet to port 1 where E is connected.
